_comment: This repo contains 3 separate apps. Deploy each as a separate Vercel project:
_instructions: 1. Go to Vercel Dashboard and create 3 new projects
2. For hotel-guest: Set Root Directory to 'hotel-guest'
3. For hotel-front-desk: Set Root Directory to 'hotel-front-desk'
4. For hotel-admin: Set Root Directory to 'hotel-admin'
5. Each project will use its own vercel.json file in its directory
